system.description: You are remarkably talented at a particular skill. Whether a marvelous cat burglar, a natural athlete, a brilliant engineer, or some other savant, your expertise is extremely reliable. You may take this Focus more than once for different skills.
system.level1Benefit: Gain a non-combat skill as a bonus. Roll 3d6 and drop the lowest die for all skill checks in this skill.
system.level2Benefit: Roll 4d6 and drop the two lowest dice for all skill checks in this skill.
